channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
Okay so I've been hosting a server for quite some time now and all of the sudden one day... It just wouldn't connect. it kicked every player off and went "offline" on the server status page.
I Changed nothing, Did nothing, and can figure out no reason why this happened.
I tried every possible thing I could think of to try to get my ip working again.
Here is a list of things I have tried:
Restoring Router Defults and Re-Portforwarding Deleting ip's from No-Ip reloading and re-creating Resetting environmental variables and changing back Downloaded jdk 6_24 Downloaded jre 6_24 Tried To Connect VIA Ip Tried portforwarding through BitTorrent...
Nothing Has Worked And There's No Reason For It And I'm Very Confused

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Kyle_coder Kyle coder
item.description:
@Kyle_coder wrote:

did you use “bittorrent” or Utorrent? because you can find out if your server is online and protforward at the same time using Utorrent.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @_kush †kush†
item.description:
@_kush wrote:

Are you using a Router? Because the network ip can automatically change every 24 hours, especially if theres multiple devices connected to it, that you haven’t used in a while.

If not, try re-portfowarding again :9.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

Sources don’t contain an ip lol. Nothing that allows connection anyhow.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @smil3 smil3
item.description:
@smil3 wrote:

try to change ip on your source, to your real ip adress.
good luck ,i hope that helped :S

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

Okay so I’ve been hosting a server for quite some time now and all of the sudden one day… It just wouldn’t connect. it kicked every player off and went “offline” on the server status page.

I Changed nothing, Did nothing, and can figure out no reason why this happened.

I tried every possible thing I could think of to try to get my ip working again.

Here is a list of things I have tried:

Restoring Router Defults and Re-Portforwarding
Deleting ip’s from No-Ip reloading and re-creating
Resetting environmental variables and changing back
Downloaded jdk 6_24
Downloaded jre 6_24
Tried To Connect VIA Ip
Tried portforwarding through BitTorrent…

Nothing Has Worked And There’s No Reason For It And I’m Very Confused

Read full topic
